transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello, ha Ronak ji namaskar.

Customer: Namaskar ji bole.

Executive: Namaskar Alok Pandey bol raha hu mai aapka manager.

Customer: Ji ji ji boliye aap.

Executive: Sir ye aapka kuch concern aaya tha hamare pass email id matlab roming se related I hope ye solve ho gaya hoga.

Customer: Actually abhi bhi thoda sa process me hai wo abhi mai thoda sa travelling kar raha tha to mai details share nahi kar paya tha aur fir uske baad nahi nahi dekhiye masla wo nahi hai aapko jab bhi karna hoga mujhe bataye koi problem to hai nahi aapko is cheez ka aap kar nahi rahe hain sir aap personal number aapka usse call kar lijiye isse kya hota hai na uski aapki image kharab hoti hai wo ticket nahi wo mujhe pata hai last time bhi aisa hi hua tha ki unhone mujhe phone karke pucha tha ki mai ticket close kar du kya tab maine usko unhe yahi bola tha ki bhai aap kar dijiye mujhe pata hai ki aapki wo rating usse us par dependent rehti hai ki kitni jaldi aapne ticket close kiya isliye maine wo close karwa diya tha to fir uske baad aap personal call kara kariye sir agar issue resolve nahi kya lagta hai system system ko ye lagta hai na Ronak sir ki ladka jo hai samajh raha hu nahi nahi wo resolve nahi kar pa raha isliye aap uske beyond ja rahe hain nahi nahi mai samajh gaya aapki baat mai wahi aapko bas batana hi chah raha hu ki kya hua hai hai na to usme kya hota hai ki aap aap mai aapki problem samajh raha hu ab aap meri problem samjhiye ki na jab tak wo ticket raise nahi hoti hai na tab tak jaise Ashutosh se bhi maine personally bhi baat kari unhone jab first time ticket close kiya na uske baad maine unse personally baat kari par unhone bahut jyada actively respond nahi diya tha us time to tab mujhe samajh me aaya ki acha ha matlab naturally unka jo pehle ticket khuli hongi wo pehle wo tickets ko attend karenge fir uske baad mujhe personal attend karenge theek hai isliye fir maine second ticket raise kiya tha ki bhai wo ek bar apne ko karna hai ek bar to wo karke khatam karte hain ab kya hai ki theek hai aap agar chahe to aap bhale ye wala ticket close kar dijiye but ek fresh ticket raise kar dijiye at least kya hai ki unke unko bhi reminder aata rahega ki ye cheez karni hai to matlab mera kam atkega nahi nahi sir aap aap unko jab bhi aap unko ek message daliye mai aapko whatsapp pe abhi isi number pe hi kar deta hu Alok Pandey ke naam se aapko koi bhi issue ho aap mujhe ek bar message daliye mai aapko resolve karwa dunga sir acha theek hai na agar mai na kara to complaint kholiye nahi nahi mujhe ticket close karne me mujhe bilkul koi aapatti nahi hai mai wahi aapko sirf problem itni bata raha tha ki wo kya last time bhi aise hua ki ticket close ho gaya to fir us naturally unka priority jo tickets hai unke upar jayega to matlab mai aisa nahi bol raha hu ki unhe kam nahi karna tha but mai ye bolna chah raha hu ki unki priority anyways matlab wo ticket agar koi dusri khuli hai to wo pehle unko attend karenge uske baad fir mere upar aayenge na to isliye wo sath me unke ticket rahe isliye baki koi dikkat nahi mujhe mujhe Ashutosh ji se bhi koi complaint nahi hai wo mere ko mujhe help kar hi rahe hain of course to aise koi aapko id password unhone dila diya hoga shayad bata rahe the id password mil gaya sir ko aapko jab bhi sir uska aapko credential mil hi gaya hai sir abhi maine baat hui usko sir aap kar lijiye aapko sahi lage naya email aapko domain account na ho uska id password aap jab bhi share karenge us time pe sir uski aage ki karwai hum karwa denge theek hai acha theek hai theek hai aur Ronak sir service ke bare me kaise baat kiya jaye sir service ke bare me matlab service jo aapke hamari chal rahi hai India mart ke uske bare me kisse baat ki jaye sir service kyuki proper use nahi hoti aapki ha wo baat sahi hai to ek bar ya to apan baithte hain sir aap bilkul bekar rahega aapko kisi naya service ke liye bola jayega aap itne purane client hai hamara itna purana service hai sir aapka nahi actually theek hai ha mujhe bhi actually samajhna padega aapke se ki kya kya services hai aur konsi utilize kari ja sakti hai kyuki hamara kya major of business bahut hi alag hai matlab hum log OEM supplies me jyada deal karte hain to hamara jo major clientel hai wo B to B hi chalta hai hmm to usme matlab matlab of course India mart hame bahut jyada help karta hi hai isliye abhi tak hum log sath me jude hue hain to ek bar wahi bol raha hu ki abhi to shayad hum log matlab factory se bhi nikal gaye hain and ab office me bhi nahi system ke samne bhi nahi hai to mai bhi jyada dekh nahi paunga to kal subah ek bar ya to aap mujhe call kar lijiyega kareeb 12 baje to mai ek bar aapke sath se baat kar paunga to mere baat bhi kar leta hu aapke sath meeting bhi rakhunga aapke sath ek chota sa video meeting leta hu taki aur ache se detail kyuki aapke jo sare jo aapke sath me log sabhi start kiye the na India mart pe aaj ke date me sir wo bahut ache level pe service use kar rahe hain sir aur aap se samajh lijiye 10 20 guna jyada business India mart se nikal rahe hain ek guna nahi do guna 10 20 guna jyada kya cheez kya cheez business India mart se nikal rahe hain wo log India mart se jo aapke sath the mai abhi ki baat nahi kar raha jo abhi naye naye log aaye hain India mart se jo purane 2014 se 2012 se India mart pe hain sir aaj ke date me unhone apne services is tarike se use ki hai aur ache se upgrade kiya hai jo jo services use kar rahe hain aaj ke date me wo sir kam se kam India mart se jitna aap nikal rahe honge business uska 10 guna business nikal rahe hain wo log acha chaliye to acha hai ye cheez bhi ek bar samajh lete hain ki kaise kar sakte hain us cheez ko improve aur uske liye ha na bilkul bilkul apan mai isko close kar raha hu aapke naam se ek feedback jayega usse sir aap satisfied kar dijiyega ji ji ji okay okay sir karta hu kal 12 12:30 baje phone hai na mujhe mujhe mujhe is number pe pehle ek bar sirf whatsapp pe message dal dijiye ha ha theek hai number pe pehle message dal deta hu aaj hi dal deta hu ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha summary:
Concerns:

- Email ID issue not resolved.

- Wants to understand IndiaMART services better.

- Ticket closing affects executive ratings.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to resolve the email issue.

- Executive will call to discuss services.

- Executive will close the ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to send a WhatsApp message.

- Executive to call customer at 12 PM next day.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- email, service, ticket, business, indiaMART
